department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Brass animal figure with many spiral spot on body throughout; tail curves back around to neck over top of body; prey in mouth in perpendicular to rest of body
dimension: 1/8 x 3/4 x 1 13/16 in. (0.32 x 1.91 x 4.6 cm) (without base)
title: Goldweight [Leopard with Prey]
